Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: WB #103 buses will operate via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 103rd/Leavitt.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Nagle/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Bryn Mawr, NW Highway and Nagle, due to street blockage near Nagle/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Nagle, Bryn Mawr, Northwest Highway and Nagle, due to street blockage near Nagle/Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.
